name: Resurrection Timing
description: Testing death and resurrection timing mechanics

entries.expectedOutput: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.

Time passes...
Oh, no! You have walked into the slavering fangs of a lurking grue!

You have died. Your score is 0 (total of 350 points), in 10 moves.
This gives you the rank of Beginner.

Do you wish to restart, restore a saved game, or quit?

Your score is 0 (total of 350 points), in 0 moves.
This gives you the rank of Beginner.

West of House
You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.
There is a small mailbox here.
